name: Night Owl
description:
You are a Night Owl, literally. Your job is to keep the sleeping people asleep while they experience events such as sleepwalking or sleep paralysis. 

Goodluck!!

A Submission to the IMGG GameJam

Credits:

Programming, Art, Writing: Nyelo

BGMusic: patrickdearteaga.com

Sleepwalker Art: GrafxKid(opengameart.org)

Paralysis Demon Art: Balmer(opengameart.org)
